title: Solayman3
author: Solayman3
content: julerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust him

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himI think your post should be in reputation section, I think this is not the right section. Also julerz12 have been a reputable member of the forum and he has run so many bounty campaigns successfully and he always escrow most of his bounty campaign payments. I think all the bounties which you listed are not escrow by the manager and after bounty have been completed, if the team refuse to pay I don't think their is anything the manager can do, but am sure he will be trying his best just to get hunters their payments. I think the manager ban you just because you keep on asking the same question without reading previous messages or pin post.

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: Can't say you lied.I joined Volare/whisper bounty campaign and I got suspicious about the payout which is in mini form, meaning promoters will get mini volare token not the major volare token and I took this to Julerz12, he blocked me and remove me from the bounty spreadsheet, im happy because he show that I was right all along, you get 1000 mini token and you will be forced to swap to 1000: 1 for the original Volare token... This BM is someone I used to respect but not anymore.

comments.author: julerz12
comments.created_time: July 15, 2022, 05:00:28 PMLast edit: July 15, 2022, 05:41:54 PM by julerz12
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himFirst of all, this is on the wrong board. If you want to ruin someone's reputation, at least try and post it on the correct board.Move it here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=129.0Also, I can give you a boat load of reasons why projects and startups don't pay bounty rewards, but I'm pretty sure none would even get into your head to fully understand it, so, I won't even bother.Lastly, as @Issa56 said, you're banned for many reasons; one of which is being included in my personal Blacklist for cheating bounty campaigns.Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMEveryone don't trust himI don't really advertise to anybody to trust me hence the disclaimers in the bounty campaigns I manage.Quote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 04:42:31 PMCan't say you lied.I joined Volare/whisper bounty campaign and I got suspicious about the payout which is in mini form, meaning promoters will get mini volare token not the major volare token and I took this to Julerz12, he blocked me and remove me from the bounty spreadsheet, im happy because he show that I was right all along, you get 1000 mini token and you will be forced to swap to 1000: 1 for the original Volare token... This BM is someone I used to respect but not anymore.  You joined but got rejected. I guess that's one of the reasons for this post?Also, you might try reading this before spreading any false information: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5393283.msg60558610#msg60558610

My accusation got you mad or something?.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PM~sniff~I this disclaimer is enough for your scam accusation  . Even then I still have a question as to whether their inefficiency has happened here . And here I see you are already multiple alts. So You are a scammer Quote from: julerz12 on July 10, 2022, 02:14:45 PMDisclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 05:53:18 PMYeah Right, I got rejected for no reason, if you don't mind then why was I rejected?.. My accusation got you mad or something?.Your accusation will not stand because it's based on a personal vendetta, if you got rejected there, is a reason for this, it's his option who gets in and who will not that's the privilege of being a manager if you are rejected then look for another campaign, don't post accusations when you cannot sustain or it will back fire.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: The OP, julerz12 is just the bounty manager in the project you mentioned, he's not part of the team.accusations like that, not right on this board thread, you might be able to move it in reputation.and what you should know, every project that you participate in on the bounty board, does not guarantee that it will pay you. or your payment can be money.what I'm not sure about, are you making accusations for bounty manager or a project you're in? after all, you must include evidence for a wrongdoing.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 04:42:31 PMCan't say you lied.I joined Volare/whisper bounty campaign and I got suspicious about the payout which is in mini form, meaning promoters will get mini volare token not the major volare token and I took this to Julerz12, he blocked me and remove me from the bounty spreadsheet, im happy because he show that I was right all along, you get 1000 mini token and you will be forced to swap to 1000: 1 for the original Volare token... This BM is someone I used to respect but not anymore.  You should post proof of your allegation all I'm seeing are the red trust in your profile that says about your character, you have been given a red tag for cheating in bounties, this is the reason why you are not accepted in his campaign, the bounty manager will only pick participants with a good record, not someone who has a red tag for cheating and with proofs of cheating, your allegation back fire in your face.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMWhen i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himBut you are a bounty cheat. Where do you even get the audacity to call someone a scammer?Quote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 04:42:31 PMCan't say you lied.I joined Volare/whisper bounty campaign and I got suspicious about the payout which is in mini form, meaning promoters will get mini volare token not the major volare token and I took this to Julerz12, he blocked me and remove me from the bounty spreadsheet, im happy because he show that I was right all along, you get 1000 mini token and you will be forced to swap to 1000: 1 for the original Volare token... This BM is someone I used to respect but not anymore.  He has the right to reject or accept anyone he feels is suitable for the campaign. Also, If you feel the payment is not enough for you, then why bother applying for the campaign in the first place?Did he force you to apply for the bounty?

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 05:53:18 PMYeah Right, I got rejected for no reason, if you don't mind then why was I rejected?.. My accusation got you mad or something?.lol, why are you so offended for getting rejected? bounty managers have the right to accept and reject whomever they want and for whatever reason. looking at your posts it seems that you took it personally when you got rejected from his bounty campaign. there are a lot of bounty campaigns where you can join, I suggest moving on and don't look back.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himWell I still trust julerz12 and many developers are still trusting him to manage their projects, its you that don't deserve our trust for cheating in bounty campaigns, you cannot hate managers for not accepting you, you can ask but you have to respect their decision, it's their privilege, you have a childish behavior that is not acceptable to the community.

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on July 16, 2022, 02:04:33 PMQuote from: YellowSwap on July 15, 2022, 04:42:31 PMCan't say you lied.I joined Volare/whisper bounty campaign and I got suspicious about the payout which is in mini form, meaning promoters will get mini volare token not the major volare token and I took this to Julerz12, he blocked me and remove me from the bounty spreadsheet, im happy because he show that I was right all along, you get 1000 mini token and you will be forced to swap to 1000: 1 for the original Volare token... This BM is someone I used to respect but not anymore.  You should post proof of your allegation all I'm seeing are the red trust in your profile that says about your character, you have been given a red tag for cheating in bounties, this is the reason why you are not accepted in his campaign, the bounty manager will only pick participants with a good record, not someone who has a red tag for cheating and with proofs of cheating, your allegation back fire in your face.What are you talking about? I have never been given a red trust before and I am never going to break the rules of this forum, OP is the one with red trust not me, I have moved on and I will never join julerz12 bounties again, my claim still stands, I got blocked after asking question about that project, me getting blocked has nothing to do with me cheating because I've never cheat, cheaters deserves red trust and with proof.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himComplain to the project itself. Im pretty sure the bounty manager have disclaimer about the funds handling or service contract within the project. If you are not paid but yet to work on a campaign. The payment will be done by them unless its mentioned that the bm will be the one distributed to you.Rejected means lack of qualification and its the bm rights if he found the users not deserving to join the campaign.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: A statement by a cheater that someone is unfair to him. Level one, OP, you're so shameless that you blame the manager for not letting you cheat at his company. I know many bounty hunters who show their face after being accused of cheating.OP, in order for you not to have problems in the future, you need to have a good reputation, as well as self-correct yourself and be on the forum honestly.And then only point out the injustice of others

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himMuchly WOW! That's proof enough for me !!!</sarcasm>Seriously though, why do Trolls such as yourself even bother?  What's the point?

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: Solayman3 on July 15, 2022, 03:09:47 PMjulerz12, Hallo everybody @julerz12 he is scammer, scam TVG bountyAnd PUGG, UCF,Squid coin etc.When i ask a question, then he will banned her bounty group,and official telegram group. Everyone don't trust himBased on your trust rating, you are the one who is a cheater and a proven liar due to multiple alts. Ever since I have joined julerz12's bounty programs, I've already acknowledged the risks because no matter what happens to the project, it's not his fault because he's just into bounty management. The projects are the one that should be shouldering the blame. He is just honest to all of the participants whether if the project is successful or not, especially token distribution in which most of the time he uses escrow.julerz12 knows what he's doing especially as my fellow kababayan. One of the most trusted bounty managers I have ever worked with since the very first campaign that I have participated under him. I stand with julerz12.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: julerz12 on July 15, 2022, 05:00:28 PMYou joined but got rejected. I guess that's one of the reasons for this post?Solayman3 and YellowSwap are butt-hurting.Quote from: YellowSwap on July 18, 2022, 05:08:29 AMI will never join julerz12 bounties againGood decision. You should have decided it before. The manager has full right of who to pay and who not to. Last time I checked in a bounty the social shillings were from template. This is a ____ project. Please ____ the project. #______Not one or two but from several social accounts. A project which wants to have their brand to be out, they do not want to pay for templates. It in fact brings bad name for them and less rewards for the users who works hard.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: OP how would you come leveling a scam against someone who have managed series of campaign both BTC paying campaign and he didn't scam. Basically I don't believe OP is saying the right thing here there's something that cookedup this accusations from his tag  already a bounty abuser and a cheat.Please read all manager's instructions before joining their bounty's to stop giving them a name due to your lack of understanding or inability to read and comprehend his post.
